title: Sampler, ca. 1745
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: cross, satin, buttonhole and chain stitches on plain weave
signed: "Elizabeth Whitmore the daugher of Rolon and Ann Whitmore was born July ye 11th 1734."
inscribed: "Elizabeth Whitmore the daugher of Rolon and Ann Whitmore was born July ye 11th 1734."
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 55 x 45 cm (21 5/8 x 17 11/16 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Alphabets, numbers, verses, and the Crucifixion.  Signature: "Elizabeth Whitmore the daugher of Rolon and Ann Whitmore was born July ye 11th 1734."
